channel.title: Adrenaline ~ Feel the Rush!
channel.description:
[center]Adrenaline ~ Feel the Rush!
[url=http://trisidia17.wix.com/adrenaline-ltd#!desktop-client/c1pfl]Temporary website[/url] [url=http://adrenaline718.proboards.com/]Forums[/url] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/5lvfoslv30q2qrl/AdrenalineV3.jar?dl=1]Play Now[/url]
Adrenaline is a Runescape Private Server highly dedicated to its development and players. We are trying to give you guys the best experience you have ever enjoyed in a private server. We are currently still in heavy development. BUT! With players to test our server our progress will go even faster!
Revision: Our Revision is 718 loading 752. We have been reworking our cache so you can enjoy a Private Server without any blackscreens. And with the latest items and monsters of Runescape 3.
Our Vision: If u do something do it good. Don't quit, quitting doesn't get you there!
Features: - All 25 skills - No Blackscreening! - Latest new items. - New bosses like Vorago. - All other Regular bosses. - Stable Economy - Dedicated Owners - Vps hosted - Auto Donations - Auto Vote - Seismic - Drygores - Custom Minigames. - Rise of the Six - 100% NEX - 120 capes (require 104M XP) - Custom shops interface - Grand Exchange 97% - Effigies - Charm Sprites - Puro Puro LOTS MORE … Last Update: Added brutal whip and some more customs! Now I think it's time to show some pictures [spoiler=Media] [size=1.45em]Home[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/99db58700bbe3b36c3dbc2090d911a9c.png[/img] [size=1.45em]Grand exchange[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/3545f562bb325f145e8f02be9df3fcea.png[/img] [size=1.45em]Boss teleports[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/f8aaaad202b8750835993465880ec60a.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/0ba24d939e3357d456aefd449b68bacd.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/586443c3c6c53a9799fcb0078a350782.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/c3a67957ac30c68c9d417831d7c9debb.png[/img] [size=1.45em]Charm Sprites[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/616f0b72f61a5aeea9140207d0325cdb.png[/img] [size=1.45em]Completionist cape requirements[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/05dd69a0a8482ac0cd2adce4e50969fb.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/e46c3b084cf0dae71a9761dcba83fe78.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/c3393c3055149a3f4a0129febe4e4938.png[/img] [size=1.45em]Shop Interface[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/6d07cae508425f3ecce1141e361f3159.png[/img] [size=1.45em]Special Items[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/95b7e16d0f9a51597bd7de85c8241c4d.png[/img] [size=1.45em]Effiges[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/fba5e131c2df1bc9a4e3f8dd2502e591.png[/img] [size=1.45em]Minigame teleports[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/a48080e16f5bc018829100f62e295780.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/f0b020b97fd287ecc23a80542f1b3815.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/d98a0ad502ae625615a266733002c526.png[/img] [size=1.45em]100 percent real Nex[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/9cf0d5e470a6b661c937fbdc793aade7.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/ed22021f6e7921ddf77a974c4c076cee.png\[/img] [size=1.45em]Vorago[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/efc7008b8059fb3300b6992b1b4bf604.png[/img] [size=1.45em]Rise of the six[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/3a6a8814c2f57894e40b6ffc73b065c5.png[/img] [size=1.45em]Slayer Rewards[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/45989b5daf4010761abfcfc8af4076cc.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/06ef4dc3f673a9b728d95950701f5d8a.png[/img] [size=1.45em]120 Capes[/size] [img]http://imgur.com/kzL7wGd.png[/img] [size=1.45em]Switchitemslook[/size] [img]http://imgur.com/bqzKoW4.png[/img]
[/spoiler] Credits Main-Owner/developer jonathan milzz, clive, and blake for some help with content
Do you support us? Show it by putting this banner into your signature! Support banner will come later.[/center]

item.title: Adrenaline ~ Feel the Rush!
item.dc:creator: @adrenaline-ltd adrenaline-ltd
item.description:
@adrenaline-ltd wrote:

[center]Adrenaline ~ Feel the Rush!

Temporary website
Forums
Play Now

Adrenaline is a Runescape Private Server highly dedicated to its development and players. We are trying to give you guys the best experience you have ever enjoyed in a private server.
We are currently still in heavy development.
BUT!
With players to test our server our progress will go even faster!

Revision: Our Revision is 718 loading 752.
We have been reworking our cache so you can enjoy a Private Server without any blackscreens. And with the latest items and monsters of Runescape 3.

Our Vision: If u do something do it good. Don’t quit, quitting doesn’t get you there!

Features:

  • All 25 skills
  • No Blackscreening!
  • Latest new items.
  • New bosses like Vorago.
  • All other Regular bosses.
  • Stable Economy
  • Dedicated Owners
  • Vps hosted
  • Auto Donations
  • Auto Vote
  • Seismic
  • Drygores
  • Custom Minigames.
  • Rise of the Six
  • 100% NEX
  • 120 capes (require 104M XP)
  • Custom shops interface
  • Grand Exchange 97%
  • Effigies
  • Charm Sprites
  • Puro Puro
    LOTS MORE
    …
    Last Update: Added brutal whip and some more customs!
    Now I think it’s time to show some pictures
    [spoiler=Media]
    [size=1.45em]Home[/size]

    [size=1.45em]Grand exchange[/size]

    [size=1.45em]100 percent real Nex[/size]


    [size=1.45em]Vorago[/size]

    [size=1.45em]Rise of the six[/size]

    [size=1.45em]Slayer Rewards[/size]


    [size=1.45em]120 Capes[/size]

    [size=1.45em]Switchitemslook[/size]

[/spoiler]
Credits
Main-Owner/developer jonathan
milzz, clive, and blake for some help with content

Do you support us? Show it by putting this banner into your signature!
Support banner will come later.[/center]
